content.text:
[@Powersource too](@JifG9OFC1cUWHCI+126iOZeqevvgF5nwrNiNXcHohYM=.ed25519) 

I've resolved the problem and released new version of both [ssb-patchwork](https://aur.archlinux.org/packages/ssb-patchwork/) and [patchbay](https://aur.archlinux.org/packages/patchbay) using [community/electron2](https://www.archlinux.org/packages/community/x86_64/electron2/). Could you let me know if that resolves the problem? I'll work on updating [ssb-patchwork-git](https://aur.archlinux.org/packages/ssb-patchwork-git/) and [patchbay-git](https://aur.archlinux.org/packages/patchbay-git/) as well.
